tutorials.title: Prerequisites
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Set up an Oracle Kubernetes Engine instance on the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
Lab 3: Deploy Bobs Books sample application
Lab 4: Access the Bobs Books sample application Explore Verrazzano and Grafana Console
Lab 5: Modifying the Application component and Creation of new image
Lab 6: Pushing new component image in Oracle Cloud Container Registry
Lab 7: Modifying Application Configuration file to Re-deploy modified component
Lab 8: Verifying the changes through application access and Curated stack
